item.name: Integration Instances V1
Get all integration instances using advanced query
Get an integration instance using advanced query
Get all integration instance details using advanced query
Get an integration instance detail using advanced query

item.description: Integration instances represent the details of specific records integrated between Sales and other Oracle applications, such as routine identifier, status, integration payload, and integration map identifier.
